page.title: 19ORMSKIRK RUGBY CLUB
page.content: The Rugby Club is the largest sporting club in the square. It has a club house on the playing fields near to the centre of town. The land is leased from the Council and therefore there is difficulty in expanding the facilities. However three years ago in 1982 the club was extended. The Club is a "Junior" Club and mainly plays local teams. However one ex. player, Frank Anderson did play for England against the All Blacks, after he had joined a larger club. The club is very friendly and in the winter the large open fire in the club house is a welcome sight after a hard game. The Club runs five sides and often a Colts team and many of the members and the players stay for many years.
